travels.title: 231 Coyle

Try to file permits. Find out we need to dig the well _LEFT_B_RIGHT_before_LEFT_/B_RIGHT_ submitting for permits _LEFT_LI_RIGHT_ _LEFT_B_RIGHT_05/10:_LEFT_/B_RIGHT_ Old house demolition _LEFT_LI_RIGHT_ _LEFT_B_RIGHT_04/10:_LEFT_/B_RIGHT_ Complete septic design _LEFT_LI_RIGHT_ _LEFT_B_RIGHT_04/10:_LEFT_/B_RIGHT_ Old house asbestos removal _LEFT_LI_RIGHT_ _LEFT_B_RIGHT_02/10:_LEFT_/B_RIGHT_ Begin new house/ADU and septic design _LEFT_LI_RIGHT_ _LEFT_B_RIGHT_02/10:_LEFT_/B_RIGHT_ Barn demolition _LEFT_LI_RIGHT_ _LEFT_B_RIGHT_01/11/10:_LEFT_/B_RIGHT_ Close on the property.
_LEFT_LI_RIGHT_ _LEFT_B_RIGHT_12/09:_LEFT_/B_RIGHT_ Due diligence to understand all the easement/buffer issues _LEFT_LI_RIGHT_ _LEFT_B_RIGHT_11/09:_LEFT_/B_RIGHT_ See the property on MLS. Go to check it out _LEFT_/UL_RIGHT_
